biotools.summary: Alternating EM algorithm for a bilinear model in isoform quantification from RNA-seq data | Wiki for programs and pipelines for sequencing data analysis | 3. XAEM: step by step instruction and explanation | Annotation reference: XAEM requires a fasta file of transcript sequences and a gtf file of transcript annotation. XAEM supports all kinds of reference and annotation for any species. In the XAEM paper, we use the UCSC hg19 annotation:
